exports.description: Gives a list of commands available in the bot.

help.helptext: `[]` means optional and `<>` is required. The bot prefix is `%0`
help.error: An error has occured. It has been logged to fix it.
help.helpmenuspbody: To get help for any command, do `%0help [command name]`

exports.description: Change the language of the bot.
exports.usage: language <lang code like "de" for german or "en" for english>
